name: Soccer Chairman
description:
Could you run a football club and balance the pressures of the owner, the manager, the fans and the press?

Could you bring success to the club and provide financial stability?

Soccer Chairman will test your club management skills and give you the opportunity to prove you can thrive under pressure!

- Hire and fire managers, coaches, scouts and physios
- Scout for new players or develop your youth system
- Build up your clubs facilities to help it grow
- Advance through the leagues and into Europe
- Speak with the clubs owner to build up the stadium
- Send players out on loan to reach their potential
- Watch match highlights of your team or skip the action
- Set season and match ticket prices to maximise income
- Negotiate sponsorship deals, press conferences, player and staff contracts
- No in-app purchases
- Autosave and save system to safeguard your game

music by grapes - http://www.facebook.com/grapes510 and Tigoolio at ccMixter

Soccer Chairman has been developed since 2012 by a one-man independent studio, I really hope you like it! I would appreciate it so much if you could email any bugs, suggestions or feedback to alex@wooksoft.co.uk instead of leaving a negative review, I will then respond to you and update the app
